description: It’s real simple. They can call whatever they want a covid case whether they test or not. Their testing in unreliable and purposefully designed to create false positives to inflate the numbers. They can also call anything they want a covid death and they have done that since day 1 in an effort to inflate their death numbers. From the start they have engineered cases and deaths that don’t exist to manufacture more fear, isolate healthy people, crash the economy and make the push for a toxic vaccine. Without the media and government lies would you even know there was a pandemic? Of course not because all common sense tells us they have been lying since the start.
